name: Space Jets Game
work: This is project I saw online while looking for what kind of projects you need to practice. And I decided to recreate it with my own kind of ships, levels and so on.
technologies: The game is realized with C# language using Microsoft Forms, nothing special the movements are just timers.

name: Sudoku GUI Game - With Auto Solver
work: I personally like the game so much. That's why I decided to make an auto solver for Sudoku. Later decided to make the game actually playable with the option to solve it if it gets really hard.
technologies: The game is realized only using Python with Tkinter for GUI. The Sudoku's are requests from a free API, and the solver is just a backtrack algorithm.
